advancement.aether_redux.convert_with_bl: Blight a block by right-clicking it while holding some Blighted Spores
advancement.aether_redux.double_jump.des: Obtain a Sentry Ring from a Bronze Dungeon and use it to double-jump
advancement.aether_redux.enter_blight.de: Enter the Blight biome, a dangerous zone filled with hazardous plants and creatures
advancement.aether_redux.enter_cloudcap_: Enter the Cloudcap Jungle, a fungal forest with various types of mushrooms
advancement.aether_redux.enter_frosted_f: Enter the Frosted Forests, an ice-cold forest covered in snow
advancement.aether_redux.enter_gilded_gr: Enter the Gilded Groves, a golden forest filled with Golden Amber
advancement.aether_redux.enter_highfield: Enter the Highfields, a biome filled with colorful flora and abundant fauna
advancement.aether_redux.infuse_veridium: Infuse a Veridium weapon or tool by right-clicking it with an Ambrosium Shard
advancement.aether_redux.kill_sheepuff_w: Obtain the Phoenix Ring from the Gold Dungeon and kill a Sheepuff with a fireball
advancement.aether_redux.mine_extended.d: Obtain the Valkyrie Ring from the Silver Dungeon and use it to mine a block farther away than you could before
advancement.aether_redux.obtain_purified: Obtain Purified Glowbuds, which give extended resistance to many of the Blight's dangers when eaten
advancement.aether_redux.obtain_subzero_: Obtain the Subzero Crossbow, a chilling ranged weapon found in the Gold Dungeon
death.attack.aether_redux.chromatic_berr: %1$s was poked to death by a chromatic berry bush
death.attack.aether_redux.thorncap: %1$s was poked to death by a thorncap
gui.aether_redux.bittersweet_charm_poiso: 10% chance to poison targets of melee attacks
gui.aether_redux.category_desc.dungeon: Changes to the textures of the Aether's dungeons
gui.aether_redux.category_desc.item: Changes to Items from the Aether
gui.aether_redux.category_desc.mob: Changes to the textures of the Aether's mobs
gui.aether_redux.category_desc.nature: Changes to the Aether's natural environment
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.alternate_e: Switch to a different texture for Enchanted Grass, that fits better with the Gilded Groves
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.better_aech: Makes Aechor Plants more consistent with their petal items
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.better_aerc: Improved textures for Aerclouds, to fit in with the newer minecraft textures
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.better_crys: Improved textures for crystal leaves, to better match their new logs
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.better_flow: More unique flower names and textures for the original Aether flowers
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.better_skyr: Improvements to Skyroot and Golden Oak trees
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.classic_bli: Which variation of the Blight to use, the classic or modern one
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.classic_coc: Switch between classic and modern textures for the upgraded Cockatrice models
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.classic_moa: Switch between classic and modern textures for the upgraded Moa models
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.dungeon_typ: Switch between three bronze dungeon variations: The original, Retro (an improved one based on the original), and Ancient (based on the concepted Ancient Vaults update for the Aether II)
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.menu_panora: Use Redux's custom main menu panorama
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.smelter_men: Switch between three different types of Aether Smelter Menus: The originals, classic-styled improvemenets, and modernized menus
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.swet_ball_t: Switch between three different behaviors for Swet Balls: The original, consistently named, and replacing them with Swet Gel
gui.aether_redux.config_desc.use_jappafi: Uses textures designed to fit with the Jappafied Aethers resource pack slightly better
gui.aether_redux.continue_delay: The continue button will unlock in %s seconds.
gui.aether_redux.continue_delay_expired: The continue button has been unlocked.
gui.aether_redux.continue_delay_unfocuse: Delay paused until window refocused! Time remaining: %s seconds
gui.aether_redux.continue_delay_unmoved: Please move the mouse to begin continue button cooldown.
gui.aether_redux.glowbuds_tooltip: Occasionally gives the helpful Blightward effect when eaten
gui.aether_redux.infusion_tooltip: Can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard
gui.aether_redux.purified_glowbuds_toolt: Gives the helpful Blightward effect when eaten
gui.aether_redux.welcome_line2: This mod has a lot of configuration in the configs, resource packs, and data packs.
gui.aether_redux.welcome_line3: Be sure to check them all out to see all of the cool features!
gui.aether_redux.welcome_line4: This message will only appear once.
lore.block.aether_redux.aershroom: A mushroom found in the Highfields. It's dull color contrasts the vibrant ones of the rest of the biome
lore.block.aether_redux.aether_grass: Blades of the Aether's common grass. It feels slightly cool to the touch
lore.block.aether_redux.aevelium: A fungal grass-like growth that spreads across Aether Dirt. Found in the Cloudcap Jungle.
lore.block.aether_redux.aevelium_growth: Some grass-like growth that grows on Aevelium in the Cloudcap Jungle.
lore.block.aether_redux.aevelium_sprouts: A smaller variant of Aevelium Growth. Can be found in the Cloudcap Jungle.
lore.block.aether_redux.aevyrn_bush: An off-white bush found in the Gilded Groves. Goldbugs will hide in this when scared.
lore.block.aether_redux.aurum: An orange flower found in the Gilded Groves. Some say it brings luck!
lore.block.aether_redux.blighted_aether_: Blades of blighted Aether grass. It almost feels like it absorbs energy around it
The Aether's grass, but infected by the blight. It is almost rough to the touch
lore.block.aether_redux.blighted_skyroot: The leaves of the blighted variant of the Skyroot Tree. These sometimes drop Blighted Skyroot Saplings.
The sapling of the blighted variant of the Skyroot Tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightmoss_block: Moss that has been infected by the Blight. This can be found in some caves in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightmoss_carpe: A thin blanket of Blightmoss. This can be found in some caves in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightmoss_holys: The blighted form of Mosssy Holystone. The viscious moss on this rock wilts in the sunlight and flourishes in the moonlight.
Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightshade: Dark purple flowers found in the Blight. They release a gas that will make their target temporarily see darkness around them.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_but: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_doo: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_fen: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
Crafted from Blightwillow Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_han: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_lea: The leaves of the Blightwillow tree. These sometimes drop Blightwillow Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_log: These spawn with Blightwillow Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Blightwillow Planks.
Crafted from Blightwillow Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_pla: Planks from the Blightwillow tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_pre: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_roo: The roots of the Blightwillow tree. These can be found connected to Blightwillow Trees.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_sap: The sapling of the Blightwillow tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_sig: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_sla: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_sta: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_tra: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_woo: Six-sided variant of Blightwillow Logs. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Blightwillow Planks.
Crafted from Blightwillow Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.carved_stone_bri: Crafted from Carved Stone Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Carved Stone Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Carved Stone Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Bricks made of carved stone. These can be found in the Bronze dungeon.
lore.block.aether_redux.carved_stone_pil: A pillar made of carved stone. Can be found in the Bronze dungeon.
lore.block.aether_redux.chromatic_berry_: A bush found in the Highfields, which grows Chromatic Raspberries
The stem of the Chromatic Berry Bush. This will grow into a full Chromatic Berry Bush.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloud_cap_block: The cap of the large Cloudcap Mushrooms, found in the Cloudcap Jungle.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_button: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_door: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_fence: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_fence_g: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_hanging: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_hyphae: Six-sided variant of Cloudcap Stems. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cloudcap Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_hyphae_: Crafted from Cloudcap Hyphae. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_mushlin: A mushroom found commonly in the Cloudcap Jungle and occasionally in the Highfields. It glows faintly.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_planks: Planks from the Cloudcap tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_pressur: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_sign: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_slab: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_spores: A block of spores from the large Cloudcap Mushrooms, found in the Cloudcap Jungle.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_stairs: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_stem: These spawn with Cloudcap Mushrooms. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cloudcap Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_stem_wa: Crafted from Cloudcap Stems. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_trapdoo: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.coarse_aether_di: A variant of Aether Dirt that does not regrow any grass.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_button: Crafted from Crystal Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_door: Crafted from Crystal Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_fence: Crafted from Crystal Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_fence_ga: Crafted from Crystal Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_hanging_: Crafted from Crystal Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_log: These spawn with Crystal Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Crystal Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_log_wall: Crafted from Crystal Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_planks: Planks from the Crystal tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_pressure: Crafted from Crystal Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_sign: Crafted from Crystal Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_slab: Crafted from Crystal Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_stairs: Crafted from Crystal Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_trapdoor: Crafted from Crystal Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_wood: Six-sided variant of Crystal Logs. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Crystal Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_wood_wal: Crafted from Crystal Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.enchanted_aether: Blades of enchanted Aether grass. It seems to radiate some sort of energy
lore.block.aether_redux.enchanted_shrub: A small shrub found in the Gilded Thicket, commonly growing on Enchanted Vertisol.
lore.block.aether_redux.enchanted_vertis: Nutrient-rich soil covering commonly found on the floor of the Gilded Thicket
lore.block.aether_redux.frostbud: A flower found in the Frosted Forest. Its petals are as cold as ice
lore.block.aether_redux.frosted_aether_g: Blades of frosted Aether grass. It is very cold to the touch
The frosted variant of the Aether Grass Block. This spawns in the Frosted Forest biome.
lore.block.aether_redux.frosted_fern: A soft, fern-like plant with smooth leaves. This grows in the Frosted Forests.
lore.block.aether_redux.frosted_holyston: An icy variant for holystone. It's cold to the touch
Crafted from Frosted Holystone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Frosted Holystone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Frosted Holystone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.frosted_purple_f: A variation of the Aether's common Purple Flower. Founnd in the Frosted Forests.
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_holystone: The enchanted form of Mossy Holystone. This rock covered in golden moss glitters in the sunlight.
Crafted from Gilded Holystone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Gilded Holystone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Gilded Holystone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_leaf_pile: A pile of Gilded Oak Leaves. These can be found in the Gilded Thicket.
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_oak_leave: The leaves of the Gilded Oak tree. These sometimes drop Gilded Oak Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_oak_sapli: The sapling of the Gilded Oak tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_vines: A type of off-white vine that commonly grows under the leaves of Gilded Skyroot trees.
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_white_flo: A variant of the White Flower, this pale flower is found in the Gilded Groves.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_button: Crafted from Glacia Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_door: Crafted from Glacia Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_fence: Crafted from Glacia Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_fence_gat: Crafted from Glacia Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_hanging_s: Crafted from Glacia Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_leaves: The leaves of the Glacia tree. These sometimes drop Glacia Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_log: These spawn with Glacia Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Glacia Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_log_wall: Crafted from Glacia Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_planks: Planks from the Glacia tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_pressure_: Crafted from Glacia Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_sapling: The sapling of the Glacia tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_sign: Crafted from Glacia Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_slab: Crafted from Glacia Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_stairs: Crafted from Glacia Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_trapdoor: Crafted from Glacia Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_wood: Six-sided variant of Glacia Logs. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Glacia Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_wood_wall: Crafted from Glacia Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.glowsprouts: A plant in the blight biome, which is a distant relative to Skysprouts. It gives off a subtle glow, lighting the area around it.
lore.block.aether_redux.golden_clover: A four-leaved clover found in the Gilded Groves. Makes a nice decoration, and can be placed in a flower pot!
lore.block.aether_redux.golden_leaf_pile: A pile of Golden Oak Leaves. These can be found in the Gilded Thicket.
lore.block.aether_redux.golden_vines: A type of gold-colored vine that commonly grows under the leaves of Golden Skyroot trees.
lore.block.aether_redux.iridia: An iridescent flower found in the Highfields.
lore.block.aether_redux.lightroot_aether: A variant of Aether Dirt that has Lightroots growing through it.
lore.block.aether_redux.lumina: A flower found in the Frosted Forest. It gives off a glow, lighting the area around it
lore.block.aether_redux.mixed_prismatic_: Petals that have fallen off of various colors of Prismatic Trees. These can be found in the Highfields.
lore.block.aether_redux.pink_prismatic_l: The blossoming leaves of the Pink Prismatic tree. These sometimes drop Pink Prismatic Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.pink_prismatic_p: Petals that have fallen off of Pink Prismatic Trees. These can be found in the Highfields.
lore.block.aether_redux.pink_prismatic_s: The sapling of the Pink Prismatic tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.

lore.block.aether_redux.prismatic_wood_w: Crafted from Prismatic Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.raw_veridium_blo: A block of raw Veridium. This can be crafted from Raw Veridium.
lore.block.aether_redux.skysprouts: A common plant found in the Aether. They occasionally drop Oats, the main edible source of grain in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_redux.spirolyctil: A shiny blue flower found in the Blight. It almost seems like an island of peace in the ocean of chaos.
lore.block.aether_redux.sporing_blightwi: This variant of the Blightwillow Log has spores on it, which it drops when mined with a Zanite Axe or better.
This variant of the Blightwillow Wood has spores on it, which it drops when mined with a Zanite Axe or better.
lore.block.aether_redux.springshroom: A large fungus found in the Cloudcap Jungle. It is bouncy when landed on.
lore.block.aether_redux.springshroom_but: Crafted from Springshroom Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.springshroom_cap: The cap of the large Springshroom Fungi, found in the Cloudcap Jungle.
lore.block.aether_redux.springshroom_doo: Crafted from Springshroom Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!

lore.block.aether_redux.springshroom_spo: A block of spores from the large Springshroom Fungi, found in the Cloudcap Jungle.
lore.block.aether_redux.springshroom_sta: Crafted from Springshroom Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.springshroom_ste: These spawn with Springshroom Mushrooms. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Springshroom Planks.
Crafted from Springshroom Stems. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.springshroom_tra: Crafted from Springshroom Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_blightw: A Blightwillow Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Blightwillow Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Blightwillow Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Blightwillow Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Blightwillow Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Blightwillow Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_cloudca: Cloudcap Hyphae that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cloudcap Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Cloudcap Hyphae. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A Cloudcap Stem that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cloudcap Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Cloudcap Stems. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_crystal: A Crystal Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Crystal Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Crystal Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Crystal Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Crystal Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Crystal Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_glacia_: A Glacia Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Glacia Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Glacia Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Glacia Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Glacia Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Glacia Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_prismat: A Prismatic Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Prismatic Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Prismatic Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Prismatic Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Prismatic Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Prismatic Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.sweetblossom: A sweet-smelling flower that contains sugar in the yellow pistil, be careful however and do not eat them raw,sw as the petals contain a light poison.
lore.block.aether_redux.tall_cloudcap: The taller variant of the Cloudcap Mushling. This can be grown into Giant Cloudcap Mushrooms
lore.block.aether_redux.teal_prismatic_l: The blossoming leaves of the Teal Prismatic tree. These sometimes drop Teal Prismatic Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.teal_prismatic_p: Petals that have fallen off of Teal Prismatic Trees. These can be found in the Highfields.
lore.block.aether_redux.teal_prismatic_s: The sapling of the Teal Prismatic tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.thorncap: A mushroom found in the Blight and occasionally in Cloudcap Jungles. Careful, it's sharp and poisonous!
lore.block.aether_redux.veridium_block: A block of pure Veridium. This can be crafted from Veridium Ingots.
lore.block.aether_redux.veridium_chain: A chain made of pure Veridium. This is crafted with a Veridium Ingot and two Veridium Nuggets.
lore.block.aether_redux.veridium_lantern: A lantern made of Veridium. You can place it on the ground or hang it on the ceiling!
lore.block.aether_redux.veridium_ore: The ore of Veridium. This can be found around the Aether
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium: A black rock found in the Aether. This rock is said to transmute into a dazzling, brilliant substance when enchanted at an Altar.
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium_brick_sl: Crafted from Vitrium Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium_brick_st: Crafted from Vitrium Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium_brick_wa: Crafted from Vitrium Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium_bricks: Bricks made of Vitrium. These can be used as a nice building block!
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium_sand: Tiny particles of Vitrium. This is commonly found composing parts of the floor of the Gilded Thicket.
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium_slab: Crafted from Vitrium. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium_stairs: Crafted from Vitrium. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.vitrium_wall: Crafted from Vitrium. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.item.aether_redux.bittersweet_charm: A charm made from Sweetblossom petals and Zanite. The petals interact with the inner liquid of the zanite crystal, giving the wearer faster speed and a chance to poison enemies.
lore.item.aether_redux.blighted_spores: Spores from the Blightwillow tree. They act like an opposite to Ambrosium, turning some things into their blighted variant
lore.item.aether_redux.blightwillow_boat: Crafted from Blightwillow Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.blightwillow_ches: A Blightwillow Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.blue_swet_jelly: A delicious treat made with the remains of a Blue Swet.
lore.item.aether_redux.blueberry_pie: A pie made of the Aether's native blueberries. These treats taste amazing, and can make a great gift for a friend.
lore.item.aether_redux.bundle_of_aether_: A bunch of Aether Grass. Flying Cows like to munch on these.
lore.item.aether_redux.chromaberry: A type of berry found on bushes in the Highfields. This can be eaten, and nourishes slightly more hunger than Blueberries.
lore.item.aether_redux.cloudcap_boat: Crafted from Cloudcap Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.cloudcap_chest_bo: A Cloudcap Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.cockatrice_rib: The rib of a Cockatrice. These can be turned into bone meal, or used to craft arrows.
lore.item.aether_redux.crystal_boat: Crafted from Crystal Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.crystal_chest_boa: A Crystal Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.enchanted_blueber: An enchanted variant of the Blueberry Pie. This fancy treat gives you a short regeneration effect!
lore.item.aether_redux.enchanted_ring: A ring found in the Bronze Dungeon. It makes the wearer collect slightly more experience from mob drops.
lore.item.aether_redux.glacia_boat: Crafted from Glacia Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.glacia_chest_boat: A Glacia Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.glowbuds: The blighted, mutated variant of Oats, found by breaking Glowsprouts, which can be infused into a more powerful purified form. Despite being blighted, eating these occasionally wards off various effects from the blight's harmful plants.
lore.item.aether_redux.golden_swet_ball: A glowing, gooey orb of a Golden Swet's gel. It can be used to craft Spectral Darts.
lore.item.aether_redux.golden_swet_jelly: A delicious treat made with the remains of a Golden Swet.
lore.item.aether_redux.infused_veridium_: An axe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
A hoe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
A pickaxe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
A shovel made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
A sword made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.lightroot_clump: A clump of the glowing roots that grow in the Cloudcap Jungle. These can be eaten, and give night vision.
lore.item.aether_redux.mouse_ear_soup: Mouse Ear Soup is a surprisingly good dish, but it will certainly not get you praise from most. However, while most people will raise their eyebrows wondering why in Veradex you have leather ears in a bowl of water, a select few will recognize your true culinary genious, gaining you their utmost and complete respect.
lore.item.aether_redux.music_disc_labyri: A music disc that plays Labyrinth's Vengeance by Emile van Krieken.
lore.item.aether_redux.oat_muffin: A nice little snack made of oats. It's delicious with a porkchop for breakfast
lore.item.aether_redux.oats: The Aether's main source of grain. Phygs find these tasty. They can also be crafted into the delicious Blueberry Pie!
lore.item.aether_redux.phoenix_ring: A ring found in the Gold Dungeon. It allows the wearer to shoot fireballs!
lore.item.aether_redux.prismatic_boat: Crafted from Prismatic Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.prismatic_chest_b: A Prismatic Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.purified_glowbuds: The purified form of Glowbuds. Unlike their raw counterpart, these will ALWAYS give you a resistance to the blight, and for a longer duration.
lore.item.aether_redux.quickroot: A root found under Quicksoil. This can be eaten, and gives the regeneration effect!
lore.item.aether_redux.raw_veridium: A chunk of Raw Veridium. This can be smelted into an ingot.
lore.item.aether_redux.sentry_ring: A ring found in the Bronze Dungeon. It allows the wearer to double-jump!
lore.item.aether_redux.spectral_dart: The ammo for Spectral Dart Shooters. Crafted with Skyroot Sticks and Golden Swet Balls, these special darts cause enemies to temporarily glow when hit!
lore.item.aether_redux.spectral_dart_sho: A Dart Shooter which shoots Spectral Darts, it's darts cause enemies to temporarily glow when hit!
lore.item.aether_redux.springshroom_boat: Crafted from Springshroom Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.springshroom_ches: A Springshroom Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.subzero_crossbow: An icy crossbow found in Gold Dungeons. This slows enemies when they are hit.
lore.item.aether_redux.valkyrie_ring: A ring found in the Silver Dungeon. It allows the wearer to reach farther!
lore.item.aether_redux.vanilla_gummy_swe: A sweet smelling gummy, it can be found in random chests in Bronze and Silver dungeons. It restores the player's hunger to full. Very useful for boss fights.
lore.item.aether_redux.vanilla_swet_ball: A gooey, sweet-smelling orb of a Vanilla Swet's gel. True to the name, this smells like vanilla.
lore.item.aether_redux.vanilla_swet_jell: A delicious treat made with the remains of a Vanilla Swet.
lore.item.aether_redux.vanilla_swet_spaw: A spawn egg. Spawns a Vanilla Swet
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_axe: An axe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_hoe: A hoe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_ingot: An ingot of Veridium. This can be crafted into tools, but not armor.
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_nugget: A small chunk of Veridium. This can be crafted to and from Veridium Ingots.
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_pickaxe: A pickaxe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_shovel: A shovel made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_sword: A sword made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
pack.aether_redux.overrides.description: Configurable resource overrides for the Aether: Redux
pack.aether_redux.overrides.title: Redux - Aether Overrides
